resources.string:
RTP = Real-Time PersonalizationTM 
RTP is as easy as 1, 2, 3â€¦ 
1) Choose whether you want to use a sample file or your own file. 
If you want to use your own file, you will be able to select from a list of files stored in your Sequencing.com account.

2) Wait a moment for the list of files to appear and then select a file. This app's Real-Time PersonalizationTM will then be powered by the genetic data in the file you select.

3) Press continue.

Your Sequencing.com account doesn\'t appear to have any genetic data. Please go to the Upload Center at Sequencing.com to upload your genetic data. You\'ll then be able to connect this app with your genetic data. Until then, please use one of the following sample files
